name: RecipeGuru
0:
”Alexa, ask Recipe Guru how to fix grilled chicken”
”Alexa, ask Recipe Guru how to prepare jasmine rice”
”Alexa, ask Recipe Guru to show me turkey recipe”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: recipe guru
des:
This skill helps you find top rated recipe by name or by ingredients.
For example, you can say "read me a recipe for perfect iced coffee", or "how do i make carrot cake", or "find me a recipe for fruit salad". 

This skill only reads the ingredients of the recipe, it doesn't actually read detail instructions.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
